com.persistit.logging

Class ApacheCommonsLogAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.persistit.logging.ApacheCommonsLogAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PersistitLogger

    public class ApacheCommonsLogAdapter
extends Object
implements PersistitLogger
    Wraps an org.apache.commons.logging.Log for Persistit logging. Code to enable default logging through Apache commons logging is shown here: 
        // refer to any appropriate org.apache.commons.logging.Log, for example
    Log log = LogFactory.getLog(getClass());
    Persistit.setPersistitLogger(new ApacheCommonsAdapter(logger));
    Version:
    1.1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ApacheCommonsLogAdapter(org.apache.commons.logging.Log log)
      Wraps an Apache commons Log so that Persistit can write to it.
